backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining institutions, students, SPP settings, payments, user profiles, and role-based access control with storage and comparison helpers.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented localization and institution dropdown functionalities with associated files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend files describing their responsibilities and Indonesian-localized behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme defining color tokens, dark mode variables, and global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading Inter font and mounting the root React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring routes, theme, authentication gating, profile setup modal, and global providers.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with Indonesian status text and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal form for creating a user profile, handling name, role, institution selection, and saving via mutation.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Wrapper that checks Internet Identity login state and displays a login prompt if unauthenticated.
frontend/src/components/layout/AdminLayo: Main admin layout with header, sidebar navigation, mobile menu, theme toggle, and content area.
frontend/src/components/theme/ThemeToggl: Button component that toggles between light and dark themes using next-themes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Hook for fetching the current user's profile using the actor, managing loading and fetch states.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity authentication, login, logout, and stored identity restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for student, institution, payment, and profile operations using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive light/dark theme color variables and applies global base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/calendar/PaymentCalen: Displays a placeholder page for the upcoming payment calendar feature.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/DashboardPa: Builds the dashboard with stats, charts, and monthly/institutional payment summaries using queried data.
frontend/src/pages/payments/PaymentDetai: Shows detailed payment info with actions for printing, downloading, editing, and handling loading/not-found states.
frontend/src/pages/payments/PaymentFormP: Implements create/edit payment form logic, loading payment data, handling submission, and managing form state.
frontend/src/pages/payments/PaymentsList: Lists payments with search, delete confirmation, and navigation to create or view details.
frontend/src/pages/reports/ArrearsReport: Placeholder page for arrears reports with print and export buttons.
frontend/src/pages/reports/ClassRecapRep: Displays class recap report placeholder with navigation and print/export buttons.
frontend/src/pages/reports/InstitutionRe: Shows institution recap report placeholder including navigation and print/export controls.
frontend/src/pages/reports/MonthlyRecapR: Renders monthly recap report placeholder with back navigation and export options.
frontend/src/pages/reports/ReportsIndexP: Lists available report types and navigates to each report page.
frontend/src/pages/settings/SppSettingsP: Provides SPP settings page with placeholder for configuring SPP rates.
frontend/src/pages/students/StudentDetai: Displays detailed student info and payment history with edit and back navigation.
frontend/src/pages/students/StudentFormP: Form for creating or editing student data with validation and submission handling.
frontend/src/pages/students/StudentsImpo: Shows placeholder interface for importing students from an Excel file.
frontend/src/pages/students/StudentsList: Lists students with search, add, import, and delete functionality.
frontend/src/utils/formatters.ts: Contains date and currency formatting utilities for Indonesian locale.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash-based), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear stored or hash parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with extended colors, fonts, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
